# presentationTimeStamp

**Instance Property**

The presentation timestamp (PTS) of a sample.

## Declaration

```swift
var presentationTimeStamp: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

This timestamp may be different from the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetSegmentTrackReport/earliestPresentationTimeStamp] if the video’s author encodes it using frame reordering.

## Inspecting the information

- **offset**: The offset of a sample in the segment.
- **length**: The length of the sample data.
- **isSyncSample**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the sample is a key frame.
